tag_list: boston, css, xhtml, html, javascript, jquery, mootools, photoshop, design
overview:
Matt holds the position of Senior Software Engineer for BEAM, with experience in the areas of standards based web design and rich internet application development. During his tenure at BEAM, Matt has architected and optimized infrastructures and client content management systems utilizing both open-source and enterprise solutions, and established the front-end codebase for such clients as PUMA and Virgin Mobile. Prior to BEAM, Matt acted as Director - Creative Services for MTV Networks where he produced a multitude of high-profile marketing campaigns and designed over 300 affiliate websites.

Matt holds a Bachelor of Arts in Communications - Digital Media from The Ohio State University.
